title: Abby Huntsman & Sara Haines
description:
Abby Huntsman joined “The View” in season 22 and was the show’s 22nd co-host. Although she and Sara Haines never co-hosted at the same time, they sit down and discuss the many things they have in common! Abby discusses her experience being pregnant on the show and welcoming twins. She also shares how being a co-host helped her find more confidence and changed her life.
Listen to "The View" weekdays on your favorite podcast app! Just search for "The View" on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you like to listen. For more: https://abcaudio.com/podcasts/the-view
